donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: The project is to enhance the capacity of Central Elections Committee and Regional Elections Committee to plan, prepare and implement polling and electoral management best practices. Also, it helps increase mass media's coverage of election process, including electoral campaigning and reporting has improved and voter awareness. Draft Unified Electoral Code is to be finalized based on contributions from various stakeholders of the electoral process and introduced to the Parliament of Turkmenistan for adoption.

project_descr: To support the national-level developments and contribute towards genuine, credible and transparent election processes in Turkmenistan.
